citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:08 AM on 02-
DEC-2022. Inspector arrived at premises at 10:08 AM and contacted licensee over the phone. According to the licensee,
no one was available for an inspection until the evening.
End Section
